attributes.action: encourage people to live within their means and borrow less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it says above when I was growing up my parents instilled in me to live on what I had and if I could not afford it to not have it. Houses being the exception, we are continually encouraged to get into debt to obtain the latest trends yet as a nation we do not produce any of these items. We therefore borrow money to fund and support the economy in other countries while our country slides down the pan.
